name: Oregon 1000 Rally
body:
# A two-day odyssey across the Coast Range from Wilsonville to Coos Bay! 
Lots of deserted roads, lots of checkpoints, and lots-lots-**lots** of trees. 

The organizing body is the Sports Car Club Of America, Oregon Chapter - the [Oregon Rally Group](http://oregonrally.com). (same folks who produce the National-level ["Oregon Trail"](http://oregontrailrally.com/) stage rally and gobs of RallyX events in the PNW.

The Official Event Page on [OregonRally.com](http://oregonrally.com/event/oregon-1000/) has the General Instructions and the Start Location. Make your hotel reservations soon!

Watch [Oregon Rally Group on Facebook](https://www.facebook.com/groups/2983485022/) for chatter.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
